aasimar.Ability Score Increase: Your Charisma score increases by 2, and one other ability score of your choice increases by 1.
aasimar.Age: Aasimar mature at the same rate as humans, but they can live up to 160 years.
aasimar.Size: Aasimar have the same range of height and weight as humans.
aasimar.Darkvision: Blessed with a radiant soul, your vision can easily cut through darkness. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.
aasimar.Celestial Resistance: You have resistance to necrotic damage and radiant damage.
aasimar.Healing Hands: You have a pool of celestial energy represented by a number of d4s equal to your proficiency bonus. As an action, you can touch a creature and cause it to regain a number of hit points equal to at least one roll of dice spent from that pool. Once you spent all of those dice granted by this trait, you regain all dice in your pool when you finish a long rest.
aasimar.Light Bearer: You know one cantrip from the cleric spell list. You can choose Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma for your spellcasting ability for this cantrip.
aasimar.Celestial Revelation: When you reach 3rd level, you can choose a form of transformation that becomes permanent for your character (talk with your DM if a change might be imminent). You can take on the chosen form as a bonus action and stay in it for 1 minute, or until you change back as a bonus action, become incapacitated, or die. Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a long rest.
aasimar.Necrotic Shroud: As you take this form, the divine energy within yourself is unleashed, causing your eyes to turn into pools of darkness and two skeletal, ghostly, flightless wings to sprout from your back. The instant you transform, other creatures of your choice within 10 feet of you that can see you must succeed on a Charisma saving throw (DC = 8 + your Charisma modifier + your proficiency bonus) or become frightened of you until the end of your next turn. During your transformation, once on each of your turns, you can deal extra necrotic damage to one target when you deal damage to it with an attack or a spell. The extra necrotic damage equals your proficiency bonus.
aasimar.Radiant Consumption: As you take this form, the divine energy within yourself is unleashed, causing a searing light to radiate from you, pour out of your eyes and mouth. During your transformation, you shed bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet, and at the end of each of your turns, each creature of your choice within 10 feet of you takes radiant damage equal to your proficiency bonus. In addition, once on each of your turns, you can deal extra radiant damage to one target when you deal damage to it with an attack or a spell. The extra radiant damage equals your proficiency bonus.
aasimar.Radiant Soul: As you take this form, the divine energy within yourself is unleashed, causing your eyes to glimmer and two luminous, incorporeal wings to sprout from your back. During your transformation, you have a flying speed equal to your walking speed, and once on each of your turns, you can deal extra radiant damage to one target when you deal damage to it with an attack or a spell. The extra radiant damage equals your proficiency bonus.
aasimar.Languages: You can read, speak, and write Common and one other language of your choice.

elf.Age: Although elves reach physical maturity at about the same age as humans, the elven understanding of adulthood goes beyond physical growth to encompass worldly experience. An elf typically claims adulthood and an adult name around the age of 100 and can live to be 750 years old.
elf.Size: Elves range from under 5 to over 6 feet tall and have slender builds. Your size is Medium.
elf.Speed: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.
elf.Darkvision: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You discern colors in that darkness only as shades of gray.
elf.Fey Ancestry: You have advantage on saving throws you make to avoid or end the charmed condition on yourself.
elf.Keen Senses: You have proficiency in the Perception skill.
elf.Trance: You don’t need to sleep, and magic can’t put you to sleep. You can finish a long rest in 4 hours if you spend those hours in a trance-like meditation, during which you retain consciousness.
elf.Languages: You can read, speak and write Common and one other language of your choice.
elf.Subraces: Choose one of these subraces presented here.

human.Ability Score Increase: When determining your character's ability scores, increase one score by 2.
human.Age: Humans reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than a century.
human.Size: Humans vary widely in height and build, from barely 5 feet to well over 6 feet tall. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.
human.Speed: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.
human.Feat: You gain one feat of your choice. You still need to match the prerequisites of a given feat.
human.Regional Feature: Choose one feature from your home region.
human.Skills: You gain proficiency in one skill of your choice.
human.Languages: You can speak, read, and write Common and one extra language of your choice.

tiefling.Age: Tieflings mature at the same rate as humans but live a few years longer.
tiefling.Size: Tieflings are about the same size and build as humans. Your size is Medium.
tiefling.Speed: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.
tiefling.Darkvision: Thanks to your fiendish heritage, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see 60 feet in dim light or darkness as if it were bright light. This trait lets you see through magical darkness, but you can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.
tiefling.Fiendish Resistance: You have resistance to fire damage.
tiefling.Languages: You can speak, read, and write Common. Also, you know the Abyssal or Infernal language depending on your ancestry.
tiefling.Subraces: You come from either an abyssal or an infernal descent. Based on your backstory, choose one from the following:
